newsitem.title: USA: Oakwood /Deutsche unit files $500 mln certs.
newsitem.headline: Oakwood /Deutsche unit files $500 mln certs.

text.p: Deutsche Financial Capital Securitization LLC, a financing unit of both Oakwood Homes Corp. and Deutsche Bank AG, filed Tuesday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to offer up to $500 million in pass-through certificates.
The certificates represent an interest in separate pools comprised of manaufactured housing installments and mortgage loans secured by one- to four-family residential properties.
Proceeds will be used, among other things, to purchase contracts and mortgage loans underlying the certificates, the Greensboro, N.C.-based company said in the filing.
